price: 18. Hicimos que las montañas Nos glorificaran con él al anochecer y al amanecer,
arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innā sakharnā al-jibāla maʿahu yusabbiḥ'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'rāqi
